name: Trackingplan
headline: Automated QA for your Digital Analytics
description:
Trackingplan automatically discovers and monitors all the information your applications and websites are collecting, ensuring that you can trust your BI, analytics, marketing, and sales tools. 

You can think of us as Segment Protocols but totally transparent, where developers can keep using Google Analytics, Amplitude, Hubspot, Intercom, Braze, etc. as they are used to. 

Installed in minutes in using your Tag Manager or adding just one line of code to your web or apps, we model all the data being sent to third parties. Since Trackingplan understands what each piece of data means, it identifies patterns, detects anomalies, and automatically connects the dots to create value from data that was hidden in plain sight:

- An always up-to-date single source of truth and data governance tool. To discover, understand and document your data and improve communication across teams.
- Automated notifications when something breaks or changes. To make sure that integrations are always well implemented: Schema errors, traffic anomalies, rogue events... 
- Easy to understand, customizable, cross-service alerts. To detect trends, insights, and problems without using complex, engineer-oriented solutions.

founders.name: Alexandros Chaaraoui, Founder
founders.description: I'm a Software Engineer and I love to apply AI in the industry. After obtaining a PhD in Machine Learning, I joined Google to work on Computer Vision for Android and NLP for the Google Assistant, where I owned the Weather vertical. I left to start and lead a ML Team at the 90-year old Rohde&Schwarz. There we patented and launched metrics for Data Analytics based on Deep Learning. As a founder at Trackingplan, I'm managing the technical department and people coordination.

founders.name: Oleg Kozynenko, Founder
founders.description: 3x founder, data geek. I can help setting up your product analytics right or anything related with data ingestion architecture.

founders.name: Jose Padilla, Founder
founders.description: Hi there! Trackingplan co-founder here. Our team joined because we had the need to do something. We had suffered a well-known problem: bad data. Relying on bad data to take business decisions is a pain in the ass. As we are enthusiasts in software, artificial intelligence and business, we had to do something about it. Trackingplan was born. I've built many kinds of software before, from desktop apps to home automation systems. So I'm excited about building Trackingplan and kill -9 bad_data

founders.name: Jose Luis Perez, Founder
founders.description:
I'm born and I live in Spain. I love creating products that matter, dogs and soccer.
I studied CS and founded three tech companies, where I took the role of CEO and product lead, but I try to code when my smarter fellows don't see me. 
At Guiomatic, we sold millions of custom travel guides to airlines
At Hooks, we sent billions of notifications to millions of users. 
At Techstars we learned a lot.
Now at Trackingplan, we help companies trust their data.

founders.name: Pedro Trujillano, Founder
founders.description:
Business and technical oriented.
Worked in development, product, operations and sales. 3x founder and VC.

## Deliver trusted insights, without wasting time on manual data audits
Achieve impeccable data quality and attribution effortlessly, eliminating the need for extensive collection reviews.
**AUTOMATED DISCOVERY AND AUDIT**
Audit your implementations with real data
![display panel](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/668fdff15c798d4f1d1c38de_Slider_01.webp)
Get an always-updated picture of your Martech stack and deep dive into your integrations, from the dataLayer to the destination.
**AUTOMATED ALERT SYSTEM**
Stay in the loop about errors and changes
Receive alerts via email, Slack or Teams with traffic anomalies, rogue events, schema problems, campaign and pixels misconfigurations, and more.
![early warnings](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/669648e20ae75cd7606f1eca_Slider_02.webp)
**AUTOMATED ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS**
Fix errors in record time

## Getting started is simple
Try Trackingplan today and sit back while we automatically create your dashboard.
[Try it free](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/panel.trackingplan.com/signup>)
Any question?
How do I know if Trackingplan is for me?
![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b0d8aecc3d285e32f88_plus.svg)![guion icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b19b96974a6d64fa778_guion.svg)
Collecting and analyzing multiple data points can be a tedious process especially prone to bugs and breakages.
Trackingplan’s fully automated observability and analytics QA solution eliminates these obstacles by detecting errors in your websites and apps as soon as they happen, or even before they happen, to empower companies with accurate and reliable analytics.
Whether you are a data analyst, a developer, or you manage marketing campaigns, Trackingplan can help you prevent data quality issues before reaching production to avoid compromising your digital analytics, maximizing the ROI on your MarTech and product analytics stack. 
How do I get started?
![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b0d8aecc3d285e32f88_plus.svg)![guion icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b19b96974a6d64fa778_guion.svg)
Getting started with Trackingplan is easy as 1-2-3.
  1. Create your account to get your Trackingplan snippet. For websites, you can install it using Google Tag Manager or by adding the snippet at the top of the <head> section of your website. For apps, you’ll just need to install the SDKs directly. For more information, follow our [documentation](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/installing-trackingplan>).
  2. After this easy installation, Trackingplan will automatically start discovering and documenting all the traffic you’re sending to all your integrations. It’s your time to sit back as we automatically create your dashboard. We will send you a message once we have collected enough data.
  3. Time to dig into all the destinations, schemas, events, pixels, and campaigns Trackingplan’s algorithm has automatically discovered for you. Onboard all the members involved in the data collection process to ensure everyone is on the same page, customize your warnings so that we can warn you according to your specifications, add regexes and enums to validate your events, and start tackling all the errors that are compromising the quality of your data and that Trackingplan has spotted.


How long does it take for Trackingplan to work?
![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b0d8aecc3d285e32f88_plus.svg)![guion icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b19b96974a6d64fa778_guion.svg)
Unlike other SaaS with setups that take between weeks and months or even force you to change how you code your analytics, Trackingplan starts listening in real-time to all the data your sites and apps are sending to your third-party services right after its [installation](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/installing-trackingplan>).
From that moment on, Trackingplan will automatically start creating your dashboard. Depending on your traffic, an hour can be enough to recollect the necessary data. However, for companies with small traffic, this process might take up to a week, so don’t worry if you enter Trackingplan’s [dashboard](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/dashboard>) after installing it and you don’t see anything! We will send you a message once we have collected enough data.
During this time, all teams involved in the data collection process teams will be able to keep working as they used to, without causing any company disruption.
Will Trackingplan affect my site's visitor experience or performance?
![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b0d8aecc3d285e32f88_plus.svg)![guion icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b19b96974a6d64fa778_guion.svg)
Not at all. Trackingplan is designed to have a minimal impact on your site. Our lightweight tag, only 10kb in size, has no significant effect on page load times. Additionally, our SDKs are optimized to ensure that your app's performance remains unaffected.The Trackingplan tag loads asynchronously with the page content, responding in less than 500ms. 
This means that it won't slow down your site's loading speed. Furthermore, once the configuration is stored in the browser cache, it won't be reloaded during subsequent page views for a period of 24 hours.With Trackingplan, you can gather the data you need without compromising the visitor experience or your site's performance.
Can I use Trackingplan to automatically QA analytics? 
![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b0d8aecc3d285e32f88_plus.svg)![guion icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b19b96974a6d64fa778_guion.svg)
Yes, Trackingplan’s fully automated QA solution for your digital analytics has been designed to avoid compromising your data by catching errors before they break your [digital analytics](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/www.trackingplan.com/categories/digital-analytics>).
You can compare [environments](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/environments>) to detect mistakes before these reach production (e.g.: compare staging data to your master specification baseline to capture bugs or regressions before they go live), and validate that the analytics performed in each of your test sessions match the expected baselines. [Trackingplan](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/dashboard>) will automatically document the [regressions](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/regression-testing>) found between them to help you fix those errors before compromising your data.
How does Trackingplan foster cross-team collaboration? 
![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b0d8aecc3d285e32f88_plus.svg)![guion icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b19b96974a6d64fa778_guion.svg)
Trackingplan provides an always-updated single source of truth about the status of your digital analytics to ensure all teams involved in the data collection process are on the same page.
Moreover, you can also add descriptions to your events and properties to enhance cross-team interactions and ensure every member is aligned with your specs.
What are the problems Trackingplan will notify me about? 
![plus icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b0d8aecc3d285e32f88_plus.svg)![guion icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/61efd60b8b04e884e03cbf83/620b2b19b96974a6d64fa778_guion.svg)
Trackingplan will automatically detect and send you alerts about any [update or issue ](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/warning-and-updates>)happening in your digital analytics. Missing events or properties, naming inconsistencies, anomalies in your traffic, property type mismatches, [validation errors](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/data-validation>)... all this and more to to keep everything that matters to you in the loop.
Moreover, Trackingplan's [Digests](https://trackingplan.com/<https:/docs.trackingplan.com/digests>) will notify your team with all you need to know about the state of your data at the beginning of your work day so that you can work on what you do best instead of having to find those errors by yourself.

## Getting started is simple
Try Trackingplan today and sit back while we automatically create your dashboard.
Try it free⟨26⟩
Any question?
How do I know if Trackingplan is for me?
![plus icon⟨79⟩]![guion icon⟨80⟩]
Collecting and analyzing multiple data points can be a tedious process especially prone to bugs and breakages.
Trackingplan’s fully automated observability and analytics QA solution eliminates these obstacles by detecting errors in your websites and apps as soon as they happen, or even before they happen, to empower companies with accurate and reliable analytics.
Whether you are a data analyst, a developer, or you manage marketing campaigns, Trackingplan can help you prevent data quality issues before reaching production to avoid compromising your digital analytics, maximizing the ROI on your MarTech and product analytics stack. 
How do I get started?
![plus icon⟨79⟩]![guion icon⟨80⟩]
Getting started with Trackingplan is easy as 1-2-3.
  1. Create your account to get your Trackingplan snippet. For websites, you can install it using Google Tag Manager or by adding the snippet at the top of the <head> section of your website. For apps, you’ll just need to install the SDKs directly. For more information, follow our documentation⟨81⟩.
  2. After this easy installation, Trackingplan will automatically start discovering and documenting all the traffic you’re sending to all your integrations. It’s your time to sit back as we automatically create your dashboard. We will send you a message once we have collected enough data.
  3. Time to dig into all the destinations, schemas, events, pixels, and campaigns Trackingplan’s algorithm has automatically discovered for you. Onboard all the members involved in the data collection process to ensure everyone is on the same page, customize your warnings so that we can warn you according to your specifications, add regexes and enums to validate your events, and start tackling all the errors that are compromising the quality of your data and that Trackingplan has spotted.


How long does it take for Trackingplan to work?
![plus icon⟨79⟩]![guion icon⟨80⟩]
Unlike other SaaS with setups that take between weeks and months or even force you to change how you code your analytics, Trackingplan starts listening in real-time to all the data your sites and apps are sending to your third-party services right after its installation⟨81⟩.
From that moment on, Trackingplan will automatically start creating your dashboard. Depending on your traffic, an hour can be enough to recollect the necessary data. However, for companies with small traffic, this process might take up to a week, so don’t worry if you enter Trackingplan’s dashboard⟨82⟩ after installing it and you don’t see anything! We will send you a message once we have collected enough data.
During this time, all teams involved in the data collection process teams will be able to keep working as they used to, without causing any company disruption.
Will Trackingplan affect my site's visitor experience or performance?
![plus icon⟨79⟩]![guion icon⟨80⟩]
Not at all. Trackingplan is designed to have a minimal impact on your site. Our lightweight tag, only 10kb in size, has no significant effect on page load times. Additionally, our SDKs are optimized to ensure that your app's performance remains unaffected.The Trackingplan tag loads asynchronously with the page content, responding in less than 500ms. 
This means that it won't slow down your site's loading speed. Furthermore, once the configuration is stored in the browser cache, it won't be reloaded during subsequent page views for a period of 24 hours.With Trackingplan, you can gather the data you need without compromising the visitor experience or your site's performance.
Can I use Trackingplan to automatically QA analytics? 
![plus icon⟨79⟩]![guion icon⟨80⟩]
Yes, Trackingplan’s fully automated QA solution for your digital analytics has been designed to avoid compromising your data by catching errors before they break your digital analytics⟨83⟩.
You can compare environments⟨84⟩ to detect mistakes before these reach production (e.g.: compare staging data to your master specification baseline to capture bugs or regressions before they go live), and validate that the analytics performed in each of your test sessions match the expected baselines. Trackingplan⟨82⟩ will automatically document the regressions⟨85⟩ found between them to help you fix those errors before compromising your data.
How does Trackingplan foster cross-team collaboration? 
![plus icon⟨79⟩]![guion icon⟨80⟩]
Trackingplan provides an always-updated single source of truth about the status of your digital analytics to ensure all teams involved in the data collection process are on the same page.
Moreover, you can also add descriptions to your events and properties to enhance cross-team interactions and ensure every member is aligned with your specs.
What are the problems Trackingplan will notify me about? 
![plus icon⟨79⟩]![guion icon⟨80⟩]
Trackingplan will automatically detect and send you alerts about any update or issue ⟨86⟩happening in your digital analytics. Missing events or properties, naming inconsistencies, anomalies in your traffic, property type mismatches, validation errors⟨87⟩... all this and more to to keep everything that matters to you in the loop.
Moreover, Trackingplan's Digests⟨88⟩ will notify your team with all you need to know about the state of your data at the beginning of your work day so that you can work on what you do best instead of having to find those errors by yourself.

**Company Overview: Trackingplan**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W22 batch, Trackingplan is based in Barcelona, Spain, with a lean team of eight passionate employees. Their mission? To provide Automated Quality Assurance (QA) for your digital analytics. 

**What They Do**

Trackingplan is like the user-friendly, transparent big brother to tools like Segment Protocols. It helps you automatically discover and monitor all the data collected by your applications and websites. Think of it as your trusty sidekick that ensures you can trust the outputs from your analytics, business intelligence, marketing, and sales tools. 

In just a few minutes, using a Tag Manager or a simple line of code, you can integrate Trackingplan with your current setup (whether it’s Google Analytics, Amplitude, HubSpot, Intercom, or Braze). This means less time worrying about whether your data is accurate and more time making informed decisions.

**Core Features**

1. **Single Source of Truth**: Trackingplan provides an always-up-to-date source for data governance, helping teams discover, understand, and communicate about their data.

2. **Automated Alerts**: You’ll receive timely notifications when something goes awry, like schema errors, traffic anomalies, or rogue events—basically, anything that could indicate a problem with your integrations.

3. **Simplified Insights**: Forget about complex engineer-driven solutions. With Trackingplan, you have easy-to-understand alerts that highlight trends, insights, and issues, keeping problems from slipping through the cracks.

**Use Cases**

- **Digital Analysts**: Automate error detection and pinpoint issues in analytics implementations swiftly.
- **Marketing Teams**: Prevent attribution errors and optimize campaign performance without manual audits.
- **Developers and QA**: Identify and fix analytics errors before they impact production.
- **Agencies**: Detect issues proactively for clients, ensuring a smoother operational flow.

**Why Choose Trackingplan?**

In the landscape of data-heavy operations, Trackingplan stands out by reducing the time spent on manual data checks, offering real-time insights into your digital data landscape. Its automated nature means that whether you’re focused on error detection, analytics governance, or ensuring data privacy compliance, Trackingplan’s got your back.

**The Future**

With a clear intent to simplify and elevate how companies manage their data, Trackingplan is positioned to become indispensable in the toolkit of any data-driven organization. Their offerings aim to not just highlight problems but also to provide actionable insights, bridging the gap between data capture and effective analytics.

**Explore More**

You can check out their product details and start your journey towards trusted insights at [Trackingplan.com](https://trackingplan.com).
